snippet.title: Hakouki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom, OP
snippet.description:
Opening from the PSP game "Hakouki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom".

--

About the game:
At the end of an era, the men of the Shinsengumi struggle to uphold the samurai ideal. When a young girl is thrust into their midst, she finds herself irrevocably tied to their tragic fate.

(c)2012 Idea Factory / Design Factory
Licensed to, and published by, Aksys Games

Available for download at the PSN Store.

---
